title:
Creamy Red Pepper Dip
BY DEL SROUFE ON SEPTEMBER 17, 2012
directions: Keep roasted red peppers and silken tofu on hand and you can make this sauce in five minutes. Use it as a dip for fresh vegetables or toss it with your favorite cooked pasta. If you are not a fan of cilantro, you can use fresh basil or dill instead.
Combine all ingredients in the bowl of a food processor and puree until smooth and creamy. Refrigerate in an airtight container until ready to use.
Photo by LA Food Photography. Find this recipe and more in the Forks Over Knives Recipe App.
ingredients: 1 package extra firm silken tofu, drained
2 large red bell peppers, roasted and seeded
